import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { deleteGoal } from '../components/features/goals/goalSlice' import{ ExpiredNotice, ShowCounter, CountdownTimer } from '../hooks/CountdownTimer' function GoalItem({ goal }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{new Date(goal.createdAt).toLocaleString('en-US')}

Habit: {goal.text}

{goal.days} Days

) } export default GoalItem
